name: Trine 2: Director’s Cut
overview: Trine 2: Director's Cut is an updated version of the original Trine 2 specifically for the Wii U console. Next to all the content of the main game that was also reworked and enhanced in updates, it also incorporates the Trine 2: Goblin Menace DLC right away as a continuation of the main campaign. Exclusive to this version is the Dwarven Caverns level. Next to the regular controllers, the game can be played on the GamePad (entirely) or the touch screen can be used for additional actions such as whipping up boxes and planks, or aiming Zoya's bow. Local and online multiplayer is still supported for up to three players.
